course_description: The course surveys distressed investing with a focus on real estate. The first module covers the institutional structure of the distressed market and valuation techniques. The second module features a broad overview of distressed investing strategies across the capital structure and market segments. The third module provides an in-depth analysis of distressed investing techniques. The primary audience for this course is finance majors interested in careers in real estate finance or in private equity and hedge funds. The secondary audience is students planning careers that have significant interaction with real estate finance and/or private equity and hedge fund industries. More information at www.emoryprof.com.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the One-Year or Two-Year MBA program.
